articles.summary: Borsa İstanbul’da hisse senetleri haftayı yüzde 3,83 yükselişle tamamlarken, altının gram fiyatı yüzde 2,80, dolar/TL yüzde 0,25 değer kazandı; yatırım fonlarında en yüksek getiri yüzde 4 ile borsa yatırım fonlarında görüldü.

articles.title: New Legend Of Zelda Lego Set Recreates One of Ocarina of Time's Most Memorable Scenes
articles.title_tr: New Legend Of Zelda Lego Set Recreates One of Ocarina of Time's Most Memorable Scenes
articles.summary: Lego Ocarina of Time: The Final Battle (1,003 pieces)                                                                                            $130 | Releases March 31                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       Preorder at Lego Store                                                                    Lego has officially revealed its next Legend of Zelda set, a massive 1,003-piece kit that recreates the epic showdown between Link, Princess Zelda, and Ganon from The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time. Priced at $130, the set will be released on March 1, and preorders are now open at The Lego Store.                                                                                                        Lego Ocarina of Time: The Final Battle (1,003 pieces)                                                                $130 | Releases March 31                                                                                                                                                                                                                      This Lego set comes with minifigures of Link, Zelda, and Ganon in his human form, but the main event here is Ganon in his final boss form. The villain towers over the minifigures, and he features several points of articulation, two swords, and a deadly tail. You'll also get all the pieces you need to construct Na'Vi and a diorama stage that replicates Ganon's castle from the classic N64 game.                                                        Preorder at Lego Store                                                                                 Lego Ocarina of Time: Final BattleLego has ventured to Hyrule before, with the first Legend of Zelda kit, The Great Deku Tree, a well-received set that gave fans all the pieces they needed to build the legendary sage. This is available on backorder through the Lego Store for $300, and the two-in-one set allows you build a display of the Deku Tree as depicted in Breath of the Wild and Ocarina of Time. Once fully assembled, it has interactive features, including an animated face that can be controlled with a lever on its back and an opening mouth that reveals a Skulltula monster.Lego Nintendo setsLego Ocarina of Time: The Final Battle (1,003 pieces) -- $130 | March 1Lego The Legend of Zelda: Great Deku Tree 2-in-1 (2,500 pieces) -- $300Lego Game Boy (421 Pieces) -- $60Lego Pokemon: Eevee (587 Pieces) -- $60 | February 27Lego Pokemon: Pikachu and Poke Ball (2,050 Pieces) -- $200 | February 27Lego Pokemon: Venusaur, Charizard, and Blastoise (6,838 Pieces) -- $650The other big Lego Nintendo set released last year was the Lego Game Boy. An almost 1:1 scale replica of the original handheld, the completed model replicates the unit's working buttons, volume sliders, and a lenticular screen. You can grab one from Amazon right now for $60.Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.title: Sony's Legend Of Zelda Movie Will Be Exclusive To Netflix After Theatrical Run
articles.title_tr: Sony's Legend Of Zelda Movie Will Be Exclusive To Netflix After Theatrical Run
articles.summary: The Sony Pictures live-action The Legend of Zelda movie will be exclusive to Netflix following its theatrical run, Netflix and Sony Pictures have announced as part of a larger deal.The Netflix / Sony deal is a multi-year "Pay-1" agreement that begins this year. The Zelda movie was singled out in Netflix's announcement as some of the first SPE movies that will come to Netflix. Others include The Nightingale, Buds, Spider-Man: Beyond the Spider-verse, and the new Beatles movies from director Sam Mendes.Deadline reported that Sony also considered making a deal with Amazon, but "Netflix stepped up." The report said the value of the deal is $7 billion, but neither Netflix nor Sony confirmed this.Continue Reading at GameSpot
articles.summary_tr: The Sony Pictures live-action The Legend of Zelda movie will be exclusive to Netflix following its theatrical run, Netflix and Sony Pictures have announced as part of a larger deal.The Netflix / Sony deal is a multi-year "Pay-1" agreement that begins this year. The Zelda movie was singled out in Netflix's announcement as some of the first SPE movies that will come to Netflix. Others include The Nightingale, Buds, Spider-Man: Beyond the Spider-verse, and the new Beatles movies from director Sam Mendes.Deadline reported that Sony also considered making a deal with Amazon, but "Netflix stepped up." The report said the value of the deal is $7 billion, but neither Netflix nor Sony confirmed this.Continue Reading at GameSpot

Others include The Nightingale, Buds, Spider-Man: Beyond the Spider-verse, and the new Beatles movies from director Sam

Others include The Nightingale, Buds, Spider-Man: Beyond the Spider-verse, and the new Beatles movies from director Sam

articles.title: X çöktü mü?
articles.title_tr: X çöktü mü?
articles.summary: En popüler sosyal medya platformları arasında yer alan X'te erişim sorunu yaşanıyor. Kullanıcılar, Twitter'da akışın yenilenmediğini, gönderilerin açılmadığı yönünde sorunu sosyal medya platformlarında dile getiriyor. Peki, "Twitter X çöktü mü? 16 Ocak X neden açılmıyor, ne zaman düzelecek?" İşte 16 Ocak 2026 Cuma Twitter'da yaşanan erişim sorununa ilişkin yetkililerden yapılan son dakika açıklamaları...
